title: Blended-Based Short-Term Core Competency Enhancement Course in Business Administration

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational business administration concepts and understanding of business communication
context.additional_context: Optimization of smartphone-based learning environments for learners with diverse prior knowledge levels.

learning_goals: Learners can explain five core concepts of accounting principles through real business cases.
Learners can interpret simple financial reports using data analysis tools.
Learners can simulate the business strategy development process through team projects and create presentation materials.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
